body:
Can you please attach a sample application that behaves as you mention?

Thanks

> Can you please attach a sample application that behaves as you mention?
> 
> Thanks

Sure. Here is a sample project:
[quarkus-upgrade.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/16781360/quarkus-upgrade.zip)

> @mkouba @Ladicek this seems to be caused by [this](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/cc6b08d6818deb440189dc3ee8bfd3752386a71f/extensions/arc/deployment/src/main/java/io/quarkus/arc/deployment/staticmethods/InterceptedStaticMethodsProcessor.java#L458-L460) code not properly copying over the annotations.

Yes, this is wrong. It blindly copies all annotations declared on the method and its parameters.

issue.title: ArC - static methods interception: fix the set of copied annotations
issue.body:
- also only consider annotations with RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME because AnnotatedElement#addAnnotation(AnnotationInstance) does not reflect the original RetentionPolicy
- fixes #42828
